attributes.action: Make the legal profession more streamlined and not discriminatory as it is now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should be a a natural progression in the legal proffession so that new lawyers progress by ability from legal executive to solicitor then on to become a barrister.There should not be the bar to inclusion by age gender disabillity or any other reason that applies now.
